review: We got this for our son and had expected there to be a lot more gaming options. There are only about 100 games, and not many sports related games. In addition, the movies are around $5 to rent...I can get them at RedBox for $1.50!
author: ancadams

review: Would give it five stars but at $100 it should include both HDMI and fiber optic audio cables.
author: CX Racer Newbe

review: Works great. Very easy to use.
author: Jessica Twitchell

review: Much more entertainment than I had anticipated
author: steven m. tjaden

review: Super fast navigation, streaming. Definitely recommend it.
author: MAHESH
